scripts.dev: npm run build -w @kispace-io/extension-neuro-viewer && npm run build -w @kispace-io/extension-snirf-viewer && npm run build -w @kispace-io/extension-openneuro && npm run dev -w @kispace-io/neurospace-app
scripts.build: npm run build -w @kispace-io/extension-neuro-viewer && npm run build -w @kispace-io/extension-snirf-viewer && npm run build -w @kispace-io/extension-openneuro && npm run build -w @kispace-io/neurospace-app
